import React, { useState } from 'react' const Register = () => { const[inpVal,setINP]=useState({ name:"", email:"", age:"", mobile:"", work:"", add:"", desc:"" }) const setdata =(e)=>{ console.log(e.target.value); const {name,value}=e.target; setINP((preval)=>{ return{ ...preval, [name]:value } }) } return (
) } export default Register
